richText.title: Large text
richText.description: Small text for paragraphs, hyperlinks, and lists.

characterLimitDescription: Only use a character limit when there is a good reason for limiting the number of characters users can enter.
confirmationDescriptionItem1: details of what happens next and when
confirmationDescriptionItem3: links to information or services that users are likely to need next
confirmationDescriptionItem4: a link to your feedback form. (if you don’t have one, you can set one up using GC Forms to be launched along with your main form)
confirmationDescriptionParagraph: The confirmation message will appear on a new page once the form has been submitted. Some useful things you can add to your confirmation page are:
contactSupportIfYouHaveQuestions: Contact support if you have any questions.

contactus.gcFormsTeamPart1: The GC Forms team provides services to people who work in the government. We cannot give general advice to the public about the forms that we host. For other enquiries, go to
contactus.gcFormsTeamPart2: to find the department or agency that can help you.
contactus.ifYouExperience: If you experience technical issues, please fill out the
contactus.name: Your Name

request.option1: Ask a question about the product and how it can work in your department
request.option3: Set up a demo to learn more about GC Forms
request.title: How can we help?

contactus.title: Contact Us
contactus.useThisForm: Use this form to learn more about GC Forms and how it can work in your department.

defaultElementDescription.email: Enter an email address like, name@example.com

descriptionDescription: The description appears below the label, and before the field. It’s used to add context and instructions for the field. It’s a great place to specify formatting requirements.
didYouFindThisToolHelpful: Did you find this tool helpful? Provide feedback
errorSaving: There was an error saving the form. Try again or contact support.

draft.message1: Deleting a form can not be undone. Your form will be removed from your forms list.
draft.message2: Download a copy of this form for your records. The saved JSON form file can be uploaded again to create a new form later.

published.message1: Deleting a form can not be undone. Your form will be removed from your forms list and the internet.
published.message2: Download a copy of this form for your records. The saved JSON form file can be uploaded again to create a new form later.
published.message3: The URL of your form will change if you upload your form again.

formDelete.title: Are you sure you want to delete your form?

formDownload.btnText: What can I do with a form file?
formDownload.description: Keep a version of your form on your computer

dialog.message1: Download a form file to share a draft form with others. Collaborators can upload the form file and view the progress that has been made.
dialog.message2: Download a copy of the your form to store locally on your computer.
dialog.title: Form file uses

formDownload.title: Download form file

formSubmissionDisabledInPreview: Form submission is disabled in preview
ifYouAreExperiencingProblems: If you are experiencing any problems with your published form, please contact support.
privacyNoticeDescription: You are responsible for drafting privacy notices that follow the requirements of the Directive on Privacy Practices.
publishedViewLinks: View and share your published form with these links:
publishingDisablesEditingDescription: Once you publish, you cannot make changes to this form. If changes are needed after publishing, use the form file to create and publish a new form.
publishNoAuthSubTitle: You can publish and host your form with GC forms.
publishNoAuthText: To publish your form, sign in to your GC Forms account. If you do not have a GC Forms account, create one.
publishNoAuthTitle: Sign in to publish your form
publishYourFormInstructions: You need the following items completed before you publish your form.
question: Question

requestSuccess.forOtherEnquiriesPart2: to find the department or agency that can support you.
requestSuccess.theGCFormsTeam: The GC Forms team provides support to people who work in the government. We cannot give general advice to the public about the forms that we host.
requestSuccess.title: Thank you for your request
requestSuccess.weWillRespond: We will respond to you in 2 business days.

saveAndRequest: Save form and request publishing ability
settingsDeleteHint: Once you delete a form, there is no way to retrieve it back again. Please save a copy before deleting your form.
settingsInvalidEmailAlertDesc1: Must be a Government of Canada email address.
settingsResponseHint1: Provide a Government of Canada email address to send form responses to.
settingsResponseHint2: In order to publish, you need to provide a response delivery destination.
settingsResponseNote: Set response delivery before previewing delivery and publishing.
settingsResponseNotePublished: To change the response delivery destination.

share.message: People you share to will receive an email with an attached JSON file. They can view the JSON form file using GC Forms, no account required.
share.seePreview: See a preview of the email message
share.someoneHasShared: {{name}} has shared a GC Form with you
share.stepOneDetails: Save the attached JSON form file to your computer
share.stepTwoDetails: Go to GC Forms. No account needed.
share.title: Share

signInToTest: Sign in to test how you can submit and view responses
startFormIntro: Add a description to your form to set expectations for those filling it out.
startP2: See and edit a form by opening it from your computer
submittedResponsesText: Submitted responses will be sent to {{email}}.

description.description: Provide more context around the problem you are experiencing.
description.title: Additional information

support.gcFormsTeamPart1: The GC Forms team provides services to people who work in the government. We cannot give general advice to the public about the forms that we host. For other enquiries, go to
support.gcFormsTeamPart2: to find the department or agency that can help you.
support.ifYouWouldLike: If you would like to learn more about GC Forms or set up a demo, please fill out the
support.title: Get support
support.useThisForm: Use this form if you experience technical issues with GC Forms.

thereWasAnErrorPublishing: There was an error publishing the form
translateDescription: Translate your form content side by side to provide a bilingual experience to those filling out your form.
unlockPublishingDescription: To unlock publishing, provide the contact information of the person you report to.
